short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: removes the x.com and replaces with the good old twitter.com when copying a link from twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of the off-putting "x.com" links when trying to copy a link from a tweet?

Or trying to copy someone else's tweet but it has these cryptobroey terms like x or even ùïè? No problem!

Just install and the extension will fix all your copied text only on twitter.com *yay*
